extendedInfo.description: ââââ Rope'n'Fly - From Dusk Till Dawn is the sequel to the best selling game, Rope'n'Fly âââââ¢ More than 25 million addicted Rope'n'Fly players can't be wrong! â¨â¢ #1 top free app in US, France, Germany, UK, Australia, and more â¢ #10 top free app in more than 50 countries â¢ New and Noteworthy by Apple in multiple countries â¢ The sequel to the #1 most downloaded swinging game, now in HD and universal! â¢ From the makers of Stickman Base Jumper, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Birds, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and more Use your ropes to swing a destructible ragdoll from one skyscraper to the others. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Perform various kind of jumps to get achievements, attach to flying planes or ballons and try to beat your friends or all other players by competing with them for the best score.â¨FEATURES:â¨â¢ Tight and fast paced gameplay â¢ Amazing looking graphics â¢ Realistic physic engine for the player, ropes and objects â¢ Play in different daytime, from Dusk through Night till Dawn â¢ Customize your player, choose from characters and ropesâ¨â¢ Destructible ragdoll effects â¢ Various objects to rope to like balloons or planesâ¨â¢ Endless playing in never ending citiesâ¨â¢ Various game modes including free mode Video Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nN53F1xzA3Q â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possibleâ¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: I am spider man.
reviews.comment: Excellent,great,cool,and amazing
reviews.author: Justin Turner

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: If the designer(s) of this game is/are reading this, will you please move the commercials banner to the main menu, so it will not obstruct a part of the screen when playing. This would make the game much more fun and you could include it in the next update of the game.
reviews.author: Una Kamilla Steinsen

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: Awesomely cool fun
reviews.author: Micaya Brooks

reviews.title: An idea
reviews.comment: For all persons that have ad problems here is an idea disable all wireless and data connections try it with any app it gets rid of ads
reviews.author: Miguel Seon

reviews.title: ADS!
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty lame that you slapped the ads right on top of everything so I have no choice but to either buy the game or uninstall it. Guess what I chose?
reviews.author: Chris Artis

reviews.title: Awesome! But needs more........
reviews.comment: Free stuff. At least 1 more character and 1 light rope is all i ask!
reviews.author: Beny Bonilla

reviews.title: Adds at  the top??
reviews.comment: Why in sam hill would you put ads at the top? It totally obstructs game play. Super annoying!!
reviews.author: Tiffani Schreiner

reviews.title: fun!
reviews.comment: pretty cool. wt u hav to do is get far off the ground then fly!
reviews.author: Caroline Walters

reviews.title: Not that fun
reviews.comment: Hard to control and the blood are blocks like seriously ... not that much fun at all uninstalled after 2min of trying to play
reviews.author: Wilfredo Ortiz

reviews.title: nice but.....
reviews.comment: pls add more free skin for free..like 2 characters
reviews.author: jack ressilver

reviews.title: Great, but could be better
reviews.comment: Cool game, but could use more interesting levels, or obstacles.Gets boring after a while when you\'re just swinging.Also, pls take ads out of the actual game so ppl could see where they\'re swinging to. Thanks!
reviews.author: M Johnson

reviews.title: Need another character
reviews.comment: It needs a Spiderman character. Then, the rope should be webs like in the spiderman movies. And also add some new moves.
reviews.author: Bhavesh Rughooputh

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Great game, good for passing the time. Wish the ad bar was at the bottom or side, it\'s so in the way where it is now.
reviews.author: Kathleen Harrison

reviews.title: BEST GAME EVER.....
reviews.comment: IT IS THE BEST GAME EVER I HAVE PLAYED JUMPING FROM ONE BUILDING TO ANOTHER WITHOUT FALLING IS A REAL FUN AND WHEN WE ROPE ON THE AIRPLANE THEN WE HAVE TO KEEP WORRIED THAT WHENTHE AIRPLANE FALLS BEFORE HAVE TO JUMP TO THE OTHER BUILDING
reviews.author: Anudeep Goyal

reviews.title: Amazingly funny
reviews.comment: love this game but it doesn\'t always load
reviews.author: Sid Shannon

reviews.title: Cheap shot at your audience...
reviews.comment: Ad placement blocks strategic rope placement and is obvious attempt to force purchase.  Rookie move by developer.
reviews.author: Adam Bailey

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: It\'s a very fun addicting game but the ads are SO annoying and distracting if your willing to overlook it then it\'s a fun game but not for me I hate add and to remove them you have to buy them! Ugh fix it and I\'ll rate higher!
reviews.author: Mackenzie Mercer

reviews.title: Pretty good game
reviews.comment: Just got it today don\'t know how you unlock people besides buying them
reviews.author: Keaton Bussell

reviews.title: Impossible
reviews.comment: This is pure stupid. The buildings are way too low so you just die as soon as you begin. I dont see why its a popular apps when there are better apps like this but with higher things to hang from. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Janet Perkins

reviews.title: not so happy
reviews.comment: plz show the ads at the beginning of the game as the ads distrups while playing n making ur game boring n thr r too many bugs
reviews.author: Divyam Agarwal
